_sText:
cs_mansion
==================
---A hostage rescue map by J4CK8 and Mikeypilk---
-------------------------------------------------

Another Cs map with this name :) I'm not creative enough to think of a new one.

Mansion is a hostage map based around an Italian mansion. The terrorists have taken over the building and are holding the hostages...well...hostage. Counter terrorists must search the building to find the 5 hostages located in and around the mansion and return them to safety. The map consists of 2 floors and a basement.

The map was created by me with help and ideas from Mikeypilk. It uses various custom textures take from the "Textures for the Real world" pack by TopHATTwaffle (http://www.gamebanana.com/members/144386) and some textures created by myself and Mikeypilk

The map includes:
- 18 Spawn points per team
- Buyzones for both teams
- 5 Hostages
- Custom materials
- Custom radar (Works but is limited*)
- Working nav file
- 3d skybox

*As the map features 2 floors, the radar cannot display both floors and therefore will only display the top floor.

To install, extract the .BSP files to your cstrike/maps folder.
